main.controllers

Class AuthController

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.controllers.AuthController

  • public class AuthController
extends java.lang.Object
    The AuthController handles authentication, maintains a record of who is logged in, and returns the appropriate controller

    • Constructor Summary
